models

Class GameMap

  • Object
    • Observable
      • models.GameMap

  • public class GameMap
extends Observable
    GameMap stores map data i.e borders, countries, files, continents The class is a singleton.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vijay, Siddhant

      • checkGameReady

        public boolean checkGameReady()

        Returns:
        true if numberOfArmies for each player is 0 ; else returns false
